title: Black screen in ranked champion select
body: My first ranked game in this new patch, my lol client screen went really dark almost black and did not let me select any champion or click on anything so i run out of time and got penalized by not choosing a champion. has this happened to you guys?

replies.body: When I am in champ select and choose lets say a summoner spell the screen goes really dim and I am unable to click on anything. This must be a glitch in the system please fix.  I must close the entire leauge client and then penalized for not picking a champ

[](https://i.gyazo.com/d455b9a955848d6bf4143dcae718d7f5.png)

This also happened to me right after I selected my summoner spells. The selection window closed but my screen remained un-accessible
yep this happened to me, it happened because i tried to change summs before my turn to pick and the menu didnt close properly

It actually happened again, and i saw a pattern which is that after going in ranked champ select and someone dodges then my screen becomes dark and doesn't let me click anything but accept or decline once a match is found.
